001package imagingbook.common.geometry.mappings;
002
003/**
004 * Implementing classes provide an inverse of the associated mapping. 
005 * 
006 * @author WB
007 *
008 */
009public interface Inversion {
010        
011        /**
012         * The inverse of this mapping is calculated and returned.
013         * 
014         * @return the inverse mapping
015         */
016        public Mapping2D getInverse();
017
018}
